    • About Heidi Phong


    Heidi is a licensed California real estate broker with a broad real estate experience from working with buyers and sellers in the residential market, to financing private money, rehab, and property management.

    With her broad spectrum of real estate investment, she can better advises her client’s investment needs. Contact her and she will take care of you.
